title: First Stories Art Gallery
description: An art gallery hosted completely by first-generation students! Students got to display their art and let their voices be heard, both through art and words.

title: Beginning of Quarter GBM - Spring 2025
description: Students got together at the beginning of the Spring quarter to reunite with fellow members, stay up to date with our org's current activities, and bond over some food and games afterward!

title: End of Quarter Social - Winter 2025
description: At the end of the Winter quarter, we had the opportunity to celebrate students' successes over some food and games and wish them a restful Spring Break and good luck for the next quarter!
